Hello,
I thought this may interest you. Its with the investment division of a Canadian Bank in downtown Toronto.
#31802 Technical Analyst (J2EE, C++,)
Position Overview:
To support Retail Trading, Security Operations and Sales Support Applications for the Broker Dealer Platform Develop, test and support Java, J2EE, C++, Microsoft Visual .Net and Microsoft Visual Studio applications built on their own infrastructure and interfaces to other systems Provide input and coordinate with DBA in creating new and modifying existing database structures using different types of databases and recommending appropriate DB based on required functionality Develop, code, write and execute unit test using different languages and testing tools for complex functions Application support, problem solving, infrastructure software installation, configuration, testing, deployment and performance tuning Support IT operations in the ongoing operations of these environments in production including incident resolution and root-cause analysis Develop master distribution lists, implementation and contingency plans ensuring verification is performed Support IT operations by pro-actively assessing server and application performance Provide Detail Design, Functional Requirement Document and CMM documentation as required Contribute to successful project completion by identifying risks and developing/recommending mitigation strategies Provide estimation of work effort for technical solutions for major systems / application components or enhancements Provide input to technical design reviews to ensure that business requirements are met Provide support, direction for application development groups & end users in the specific use the of end user tools
Required Skills:
Min. 5 years of previous development experience in a business driven information systems environment, preferably within the financial industry Several years experience with JAVA, C++ (Delphi, Borland experience an added advantage), STL and MFC class libraries, MS SQL, Java 2, JavaScript, HTML, Crystal Reports, Sybase Knowledge .NET and XML technology and advantage. Experience of design, coding and support of large-scale C++ class applications Proficient knowledge of multiple platforms and ability to select appropriate platform to meet business partner needs Demonstrated knowledge of Internet infrastructure and e-Business application design, development, testing and implementation Proficient with personal computer productivity tools such as Microsoft Office, MS Project and technical design tools including Visio. Nice to have knowledge of JCL and Word Macros Ability to facilitate small to large group meetings for technical design, decision making, problem solving and task implementation
Salary is competitive with great benefits, bonus, g-RSP match, stock purchase plan etc.
If you, or perhaps someone you know, are interested in this job, please contact Carlos with a new resume, details of experience and salary. Thank you,
Carlos Goncalves C. G. Consulting Group Inc. Tel: 1 (905) 753-8400 Fax: 1 (905) 753-2112 Email: carlos@cgconsultinggroup.com
